head_title: 最も高度なマイニングプール
title: マイニングプールの未来を築く
description: モダンな仮想通貨マイニングのための革新的なマイニングプール。

coin_earnings_cards.estimated_tooltip: Estimated earnings are based on performance of mining last 7 days on our pool.
coin_earnings_cards.more_title: 近日、さらに多くのコインに対応予定！
coin_earnings_cards.more_description: We are working to launch multiple pools in the near future. Stay connected by joining our discord or telegram.

mined_coins_section.title: Coins we mine
mined_coins_section.description: Flexpool is a Multi-Coin mining pool, which means that you can mine your favorite coins on Flexpool.

eth.title: Ethereumについて
eth.description: Ethereum is a worldwide computer created to power Decentralized Applications known as Smart Contracts.

calculator.title: Income Calculator
calculator.title_tooltip: The Estimated Income is calculated based on the 24-hour average network difficulty and the 24-hour average block reward. This calculation does not include Stale and Invalid shares.

item_1.title: Lightning speed
item_1.description: We use specialized high-performance server clusters powered by superfast software designed to handle over 100 TH/s.

item_2.title: Just Better
item_2.description: You can forget your poor mining experience. Flexpool is backed by high-quality support, and we are always happy to help!
